## IPoseProbabilities interface

The detected hand poses.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPoseProbabilities 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fistProb](./yoha.iposeprobabilities.fistprob.md) | number | Probability of fist gesture. |
|  [pinchProb](./yoha.iposeprobabilities.pinchprob.md) | number | Probability of pinch gesture. Pinch means tip of index finger and tip of thumb touch. |
